title: ope-gateway
desc: Web gateway, handles routing between apps

title: ope-dns
desc: Responds to DNS queries regarding your app domains (e.g. canvas.ed)

title: ope-redis
desc: Memory caching server, used by Canvas and other apps

title: ope-postgresql
desc: Postgresql database server, used by Canvas and other apps

title: ope-fog
desc: Laptop imaging server, holds windows images for deployment

title: ope-canvas
desc: Canvas LMS server setup to work offline

title: ope-canvas-rce
desc: Remote Editor for Canvas (*** Required for full canvas functionality ***)

title: ope-smc
desc: Student Management Console - import students and integrate with Canvas and other apps

title: ope-coco
desc: CodeCombat, learn to code in a game environment by solving puzzles

title: ope-freecodecamp
desc: FreeCodeCamp learn to write code through lessons from freecodecamp.com

title: ope-jsbin
desc: Web based javascript development tool for learning web and javascript development

title: ope-kalite
desc: KhanAcademy Lite - learn many different subjects available on Khan Academy

title: ope-rachel
desc: RACHEL web server, import large library of offline resources

title: ope-stackdump
desc: Offline version of StackOverflow filtered for inmate use

title: ope-wamap
desc: WAMAP.org - math LMS tool with open source curriculum, videos, and exercises
